games.title: Path to Pleasure
games.bodyText: Explore the beautiful moments that define the journey of love in this relationship card game.

cards.title: On a scale of 1 to 10, how satisfied are you with our current sex life?
What is one positive memory or moment related to our intimacy that stands out to you?
How comfortable do you feel discussing our sex life openly?
What frequency of intimacy do you find ideal for our relationship?
Do you have any preferences or desires regarding who initiates intimacy?
Can you share one or two things that really turn you on?
How do you feel about increasing the amount of non-sexual physical affection in our daily lives?
Are there any fantasies or role-playing scenarios you would like to explore together?
How can we improve communication about our desires and preferences in the moment?
Are there specific things you'd like to try or experiment with in the bedroom?
What type of environment or setting enhances your mood for intimacy?
How can we take turns initiating intimacy to ensure a balanced approach?
In what ways can we increase affection and connection outside of intimate moments?
How do you think our emotional connection impacts our physical intimacy?
What can we do to promote body positivity and acceptance in our intimate moments?
Do you have specific sensory preferences (touch, taste, smell) that enhance your experience?
How often would you like to have check-ins to discuss our sex life and ensure satisfaction?
Are there common desires or interests we haven't explored yet that you'd like to discuss?
How can we ensure that both of us feel comfortable expressing our desires and boundaries?
Are you open to exploring erotic content together, such as literature or videos?
How do you feel about incorporating sensual massages into our routine?
Are there any sexual health concerns or considerations we should address together?
Can you share more specific preferences you have regarding our physical intimacy?
How satisfied are you with the variety and creativity in our intimate experiences?
What steps can we take to explore each other's deeper, more intimate desires?
In what ways can we deepen our emotional vulnerability to enhance our connection?
What actions or changes can we make to enhance each other's satisfaction?
Are there ultimate intimate desires you have that you haven't shared before?
How can we strengthen our overall connection and trust to improve our sex life?
What are some goals or aspirations you have for our sex life in the future?

games.title: Our Road Ahead
games.bodyText: Look toward the future if you are still early in your relationship.

cards.title: What are your individual goals for the next year?
How do you envision spending holidays together in the future?
What is your preferred way of resolving conflicts?
Do you see us living in the same city long-term?
What qualities do you admire in a life partner?
How do you handle financial decisions and planning?
What are your career aspirations, and how might they impact our relationship?
How important is having a family to you?
How do you picture your ideal home?
What hobbies or activities do you see us doing together in the long run?
Where do you see yourselves in five years?
What values are most important to you in a long-term relationship?
How would you like to share responsibilities in a future household?
What role does spirituality or religion play in your vision for the future?
How would you like to handle major life changes or challenges as a couple?
What are your thoughts on combining finances in the future?
How do you handle stress, and how can we support each other during tough times?
Do you see us traveling together in the coming years?
How do you prioritize personal space and alone time in a relationship?
How important is it for you to maintain connections with extended family?
What role should friends play in our lives as a couple?
What kind of legacy do you want to leave together?
How would you like to divide household chores and responsibilities?
What are your thoughts on career vs. family balance?
How do you handle uncertainty and change?
What kind of support do you need from your partner during challenging times?
How do you view the concept of retirement, and how does it fit into our future plans?
What is your preferred communication style during difficult conversations?
How do you define success in a relationship?
How do you plan to maintain intimacy and connection over the years?
What are your thoughts on continuing education and personal growth as a couple?
How do you imagine spending your free time together as retirees?
What kind of traditions do you want to establish as a couple?
How important is it for us to share common interests and hobbies?
What role does health and wellness play in our long-term plans?
How do you feel about joint decision-making in the relationship?
How would you like to support each other's individual dreams and aspirations?
What steps can we take to ensure our relationship remains strong over time?
How do you envision celebrating milestones and achievements together?
What legacy or impact do you hope our relationship will have on others?

games.title: Parental Practice
games.bodyText: Prepare for the road to parenthood

cards.title: What are your initial thoughts about having children someday?
How do you feel about the idea of being parents in the future?
What values do you believe are important to instill in our children?
How do you envision balancing work and family life as parents?
What are your thoughts on the number of children you'd like to have?
How do you plan to share parenting responsibilities?
How would you approach disciplining and setting boundaries for our children?
What role do you see extended family playing in our children's lives?
How important is formal education in your vision of parenthood?
What parenting styles do you admire or find effective?
How do you plan to prioritize quality time with our children?
What kind of activities or traditions would you like to do as a family?
How do you view the use of technology in our children's lives?
What role should religion or spirituality play in our children's upbringing?
How do you plan to support our children's individual interests and talents?
What is your stance on balancing a career with active involvement in our children's lives?
How would you handle disagreements on parenting decisions?
How do you plan to address and navigate challenges that may arise in parenthood?
What kind of support do you expect from each other during the early stages of parenting?
How do you envision creating a loving and supportive family environment for our children?
